content.2: I know that thou canst do every
content.4: Hear, I beseech thee, and I will speak: I will demand of thee, and declare thou unto me.
content.5: I have heard of thee by the hearing of the ear: but now mine eye seeth thee.
content.8: Therefore take unto you now seven bullocks and seven rams, and go to my servant Job, and offer up for yourselves a burnt offering; and my servant Job shall pray for you: for him will I accept: lest I deal with you
content.9: So Eliphaz the Temanite and Bildad the Shuhite
content.11: Then came there unto him all his brethren, and all his sisters, and all they that had been of his acquaintance before, and did eat bread with him in his house: and they bemoaned him, and comforted him over all the evil that the
content.13: He had also seven sons and three daughters.
content.14: And he called the name of the first, Jemima; and the name of the second, Kezia; and the name of the third, Keren-happuch.
content.15: And in all the land were no women found
content.16: After this lived Job an hundred and forty years, and saw his sons, and his sons’ sons,
